content.detailedDescription: My daughter woke up and i took her downstairs around 2:40 a.M. she asked for a cup of water, so i went into the kitchen to get her one. after turning off the light, i noticed a very bright, blinking light off to the west. initially i thought it was a planet, but then i realized it was moving back and forth and up and down. i took the cup of water to my daughter, and went back to the window to watch it move, realizing it had multi-colored lights that seemed to be red, blue, yellow, green and white blinking. it seemed to wobble slightly and then would move ever so slightly up and down and back and forth, with some movements that were much quicker than others. thinking maybe it was a plane or helicopter, i then noticed an airplane flying at the same degree above the horizon and realized there was no way this was an airplane. i went upstairs and woke up my husband and told him to look at it. ever the skeptic (and half-asleep), he swore he didn't see it moving, and told me to go back to sleep. i went to lie down for about 5 minutes and had to get back up to see it again to make sure i hadn't been seeing things. it was gone. there were no clouds, and no other stars or planets observable nearby.
content.summary: Looked out my window and noticed an object that was moving with multi-colored blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: Few sites if i had good camera would get photo,s.   triangle delta ,buzz,( like the sound you get from a fridge with the coolent bottle ) makes me believe there is some sort of freezing taking place. this was reported also back in 87 but the story told is bull nothing like the real ( sheffield incident) wich is on youtube, and another guy how does lectures. i was with the police out searching for crash retreval and it was not no where near what is reported. also light that before disapiars splits into three then vanish. next. no light seen but suddenly a flash in 4 to 6 different places you can tell there would be about 2to3 hundred yards between each flash in a line what is so fast i think it happens then you mind caches up split second.[ i would like to say i research on my own but keep my location secret but if anyone is interested please contact must have camera as i really want to be the first to film real objects not the rubbish on youtube . wether it is millatery or otherwise .These objects defo do not have engines . with a bit of time and right location you would see one up close . like i state the buzzing noise like power line i believe is some thin freezing . so that proves that it works on a bigger scale.Any way please contact as i will this year be taking photo,s 100%. thanks youres jason
content.summary: Stealth like know where to be to not be seen

content.detailedDescription: Riding my bike down curvy road (miller store road) next to norfolk airport about 2am ,norfolk,virginia; saw a flash of light shoot straight up into the sky, similar to a "shooting star" but heading straight up. object seemed to disappear and reappear (maybe behind dark clouds?), but maintained a straight path up. when it reached a certain distance it started to arch downward, but was propelled back up with something like a boost that let off spark-like emissions. maybe fuel burning like rocket fuel? after that it continued into the dark cloudy sky until out of sight. made my eyes water for doubting ufo abductees and people who claim to have seen/encountered ufo/extraterrestrial phenonemon sp?
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Riding my bike down curvy road next to norfolk airport about 2am; saw a flash of light shoot straight up in the sky similar to a "shooting star" but heading straight up

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving general mills my place of employment and when pulling out of the parking lot notice like five or six head light in a row over the rio grande are of town hovering when pulling out of work noticed the lights under the bridge getting closer and brighter and then the were gone when i got near my house where the elevation is higher there were no lights to be seen.
content.summary: Looked like huge head light s like 5 in a row hovering

content.detailedDescription: In the car in the drive way listening to the radio. my boyfriend woke me up asked me if i saw anything outside. and we both noticed a star like object just standing still hovering not making a sound just blinking colored lights (red, blue, green, and orange). we've been watching it for about an hour now and it's still not moving. there are no clouds in the sky. perfect clear night. only stars no plains helicopters or ect. it's now 12:48am.
content.summary: To far to see but flashing red blue green and orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up one early morning, approx 4:30am, last month and went outside on my porch to smoke a cigarette. i couldn't help but notice how clear the sky was. i could see bright stars and notice one that was reddish color and figured it might be mars. it suddenly starting moving downward and to the right. at that point i ran inside to grab my cell phone and tried taking video of it. my phone isn't that great quality and after viewing the video it is only black. it moved downward and to the right and took about 1 minute total. after taking the video i couldn't find the object i was had seen move. it had vanished. i can't tell for sure what date the video is from because i think my cell phone, at the time, had the wrong date programmed. i since have received a new cell phone but the video was transferred to the new phone. i think it was either late january or early february. the object moved slowly with no jerking or sharp turns.
content.summary: I was looking up and noticed what looked like mars. started moving down and over

content.detailedDescription: I was in army mechanized infantry.  my friend melman woke up everyone and said he saw a ufo.  i was only only in the m113 armored personnel carrier to get up and look.  he said it zigzagged across the sky and pointed to it.  i took my binoculars and looked at it.  it was next to a star and was therefore easy to tell it was perfectly still.  it blinked two lights just like what you would expect an airplain to do.  melman was quite excited and insisted that it zigzagged impossibly across the sky.  i was trying to figure out what it could be when it shot across about 60 degrees of sky in less than a half second and seemed to instantly stop next to another one.  i am an engineer and know that the acceleration this thing displayed was not even close to possible unless it used technology far beyond anything commonly known.  now i understood why melman was so excited.  after another few minutes, one tuned white and seemed to shoot off toward space and disappeared in a few seconds.  we got a call to move and so that was it.  we didn't tell anybody it or even talk about it which seems a bit strange to me in hindsight.  i don't think it was something from our military.  it was way too fast.  it was over a military base.  i am quite sure it was a real object even though i didn't see anything but lights.  i don't know why it would have blinking lights like an airplane or why it zigzagged assuming melman was accurate and i don't think he lied.  to me, my attitude was, wow they really do exist.  i will tell people about it from time to time but i see a lot of skepticism which is kind of annoying but understandable i suppose.
content.summary: Friend woke me.  watched it with binoculars for several minutes next to star. extreme acceleration to second object and stopped on dime next to it

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to look at full moon then noticed two 
 stars grouped together. one red ...One white shaped like sideways > <.    them noticed another grouping.  then another. various parts f the sky.  figure satellites but there were ten in the northwest sky and one in isouth. i've never seen groupings like that. then the red side pulse out... only white sideways v left.  then just looked like stars .. then gone.
content.summary: Sideway double v shaped lights.. white and red.. pulsed. grouped in 2 sideway v's. then became one light. like a star. saw ten groups.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed red flashing light hover then turn towards moon, climbed and lost sight.  i tried calling my son to bring out my camera, but he was taking a test.....  i dropped my phone and when i looked up, it was gone......

it was a perfect view, as it floated up in front of the moon...   it looked like a cigar shape until it turned towards the moon....  then i saw what i can describe as an appendage from the top center, that i could not see before it turned...   it reminded me of a bird of prey??? like a viewing tower in the center of the cigar, going up?.....



call me if you need more info>>


thank you
content.summary: Witnessed red flashing light hover then turn towards moon, climbed and lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: On 3/25/2013...I watch a show and record it.    had jared lee on there.  well when i was 9 or 10 year old  i my mon and dad saw the same thang thes lights were right on the ground  and moven fast...The next night thay lite up  the hole holer   tow more guys saw the same thang 3 mile to the north up close    any way  just saying .       and if thay any way u can get me in touch with jared lee  id like to talk to him   thanks
content.summary: Two lights 1foot off ground.Next night   big lite

content.detailedDescription:
I was 15 years old, it was a summer night about 8:30pm when my mother asked me to go to the store and pick up a wedding/shower present. the store was to close at 9:00pm. this is a small town, so no other traffic on the road, i had all the car windows down and no radio on. i came around a slight right turn that was slightly higher elevation than the road ahead that was straightfor about 3 miles. i noticed 2 groups of lights on my left at about eye level - 2 green and 1 red. they appeared to be crossing the road slowly at a shallow oblique angle. i set my speed to be below the point where i guestimated they would cross the road. then 1 set of lights sped up and disappeared quickly to my right while the other set seemed to hover. as i approached, the lights "floated" across the road above me at barely above the telephone poles. i pulled off the road and leaned out of the car to get a better look aboe me. it was a large, circular shape dark against the night sky with the lighs clustered in the middle. it floated with no sound like a leaf back in the direction i had come from, then it  reversed back to it's original path and disappeared quickly over the mountains with no sound and no apparent acceleration.
even at that age i had an interest in unusual things and was a star gazer from an early age. at this point in history, there were a lot of ufo reports in the north georgia area. i feel even at that age i was an objective observer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufos observed. one sped off, the other seemed to wait for me to approach in car.

content.detailedDescription:
Was in janos chihuahua mexico driving back to his house at night when coming around a curve we noticed it hovering on top of a hill it was round
and had lots of colorful lights all around. dont remember much of it after or how i lost sight of it
content.summary: Driving on road seen it hovering over hill

content.detailedDescription: Most ufo are ms. blanks out of area %@ or from the black mail box how did you love our hollograms nice tech huh we till next time nwo out hi donald hows dr.Sholtz say hi to ms.X joe
content.summary: Love the css and nasa lot 2 ship it made news in china and on fox news good job team

content.detailedDescription: I went to the kitchen to get a pepsi, and saw blinking outside the window over porter ranch i saw what i first thought was an airplane but realized that it was brighter and then paid attention to the flashing and there was no pattern to it, so i looked real close and saw several other lights scattered closely around the main flashing lights, the object was stationary if not moving super slowly, i saw it from my kitchen window and there was a palm tree in my eye line that the ufo slowly went behind. me and my girlfriend put on shoes to go outside and get a a better view but then it was gone. or i just couldnt find it anymore.
content.summary: Bright randomly flashing red and white lights in center 10 or so dimmer lights surrounding arranged like a small pox shot

content.detailedDescription: Around ten lights flashed on then off one at a time,they were  orange.Lights were star like.
content.summary: Around ten lights flashed on then off one at a time,they were  orange.Lights were star like

content.detailedDescription: I drive a bus in park city. i was sitting at a mandatory stop in deer valley at the snow park lodge. i usually will get out and wait for my time point to leave, so i was standing and leaning against the wall facing down deer valley when a light ascended over the hill. it was flashing red, white, blue and at first i thought it was a helicopter, since life flight is a constant thing to see here. i love to watch and listen to helicopters fly, that is why i noticed it.  but then it shot across the skyline, stopped on a dime, shot up, stopped,  and then shot again at an angle towards salt lake city where i lost sight of it as it went out of sight. the sighting lasted no more than 30 seconds, but i do know what i saw. there is no way we have technology capable of that.  i have seen other strange aeronautical things around this area.
content.summary: Ufo over park city, shot across the sky in ways that modern technology can not do

content.detailedDescription: On november 28th 2012 at appx 6:30 p.M. my fiance and i were traveling south on hwy 139 going home. we were talking and had the radio on in our car when bright white lights caught my attention to my left as i was driving. there was a red light that flashed a couple of times as well. at first the distance of the lights was so far away over the field that i assumed it was some sort of cell phone or radio tower as it appeared to stand still in the air above the field. then as we coninued down the hwy it started moving parallel with our vehicle. i asked my fiance repeatedly"what is that" he said over and over i dont know. he said its probably an airplane which could have been possible because of our close proximity to the army base and we see helicopters fly in and out routinly. however i thought it was strange that it had hovered for so long over the field and it seemed to be following us. i was so in awe of this craft that i came to a stop in the middle of the hwy not realizing there was a vehicle directly behind me. luckily they saw what we were looking at but just went around us as we sat in the road and they continued down the hwy slowly. when we stopped it seemed as tho the craft stopped as well but i cant say for sure that it came to a complete stop or if it was going so slowly that it just appeared that way. we sat in the car observing the craft for only a couple of minutes when it took off and we decided to keep up with it so we followed passing the road to our house and continuing for about 2 1/2 miles. when the craft was too far and fast for us to catch up my fiance pleaded with me to turn around and go home because we didnt have enough gas to waste driving after something that was already gone. i decided he was right when i could no longer see the craft. plus it was dark and we weren't entirely sure of what we saw. i turned around in a near driveway and headed back toward our rd. right before we reached our road then on the right side we caught a glimpse of the same craft coming back. so i pulled off the road at a gravel spot directly across from our road. we watched as the craft cameover the field by our road in front of us. i took out my cell phone and started to call 911 forgeting that we have no service close to where we live or anywhere near our road. im not sure why i was gonna call but i was starting to become alittle frightened but still in total awe as was my fiance. we couldnt take our eyes off of it because it's actions were so peculuar. i did manage to use my cell phone to video brief clips of the craft when it was not so far from us. we stood with our car doors open leaning on the doors but still close enough that we could jump in the car quickly if we needed. it hovered several minutes almost directly in front of us and to be honest i beleive whoever it was was watching us because while im trying to video record with my phone it went from a complete stop hovering in front of us to slowly flying over the top of us at such a low altitude that it frightened us back into our car. as it came upon us i could see a definate triangle shape or like boomerange shape but it absolutly had 3 points with lights and a red light that only occasionally flashed.We watched out the windows trying to see which way it was goin but the lights didnt come into view so i raised up and looked through the top op the windshield and realized that it was hovering over us. my boyfriend kept yelling at me to go, just drive but i wanted, no i had to keep watching it even though i was scared and it felt alil surreal. it didnt stay over us but a minute or so and when it took off it slowly continued on the slow path it was on then when not far from over us it shot off in the opposite direction like a bullet back over us and quickly out of sight. we sat a minute talking about what we had just saw and once we gathered our thoughts we left and went straight home. when i got home and finally got cell signal i called my dad to tell him what we experienced and he assured me that it was probably a slealth plane from my describtion and we live so close to the army base that we wanted to credit it to nothing more than an army aircraft but i have talked to people that say a stealth plane cannot hover or go forward stop abruptly, then go straight backwards. i would like to know how i could find out how i would go about getting radar records for what was in the area over hwy 139 and intersectin 164 that november evening at 6:30-6:40pm central time. i want to think that it was military but im afraid that it was something else and if it was army aircraft they were playing a game with my fiance and i. and if it wasnt then it just left us with more questions.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a u.F.O over a field when fiance and i were going to our house that evening.Hovered over us at one point.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This happened when i was young, and it was during the summer time in 1998, june time perhaps? i'm unsure of the month so june is the estimate, and the day has passed my mind, considering being young i tended not to pay attention to that.

around this time, i was living in courtenay, bc, canada. the night of this sighting there were aurora borealis present. we (my family) were watching the aurora in some lawn chairs out in our backyard at around 9pm. i think we watched the aurora for a good 30 minutes until we saw something appear directly above our house. my father actually pointed it out first saying "look guys, a ufo", and that's when we all saw it.

it looked like a line of 3-4 lights in crescent shape, the lights flashed in a pattern where the light moved to the right and the lights behind turned off. it just flashed this way constantly. the lights were white with yellow undertones and very bright. i couldn't see a structure behind the lights, but i assume it was black or some dark colour because some stars were obstructed behind it as it hovered still in place and silently.

upon seeing the craft we all had this sense of excitement, and watched it for 5 minutes (estimated). when we realized that it wasn't moving from above our house, we all got this sense of unease and dashed right inside. i don't remember much after that, and that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over house, observed during aurora borealis

content.detailedDescription: The events of january 2006 were the culmination of nearly two months of what i believe were some sort of extraterrestrial contact. due to the extended nature of this event it is difficult to surmise in one short paragraph. i am writing this because of the recent airing of the bucks county pa sightings. during my sighting i have also witnessed the same strange twinkling lights descending throughout the trees. this is why i am writing this letter now. i am willing to elaborate more on this and i will also be willing to submit to any testing that would need to be performed to prove my honesty. many people in my town know of this and i've already been made the fool because of a life changing event that many people don't understand. thanks rich.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: Multiple ufos. entity sighing. very tall approximately 12-15 feet

content.detailedDescription:
I do not want my last name published with this event, but i am willing to talk to mufon about it. 

this event started at my home in wells branch. my husband noted a light outside of my living room window which i believe faces west. at first i thought it was just a star, but as i sat there it started to move oddly. i called a family member who has seen an object like this on another occasion with me. she was south of here but i told her which direction to look. she saw it and got in her car to drive to leander and was able to view it all the way there. i decided to get in my car and meet her at her house. i took the toll road.. entered at shoreline, took 45 west to 183a. as i was driving on 45 west i saw the light approaching, right after the 620 exit it stopped hovered and dropped very fast as if it were going to crash. i screamed because i thought there was about to me some type of tragic accident. but after it stopped, hovered and dropped it "floated" north to leander. when i was on the very top of the 183a exit off 45w i could see three of them - she was home by then and saw them too. she also saw when the object dropped. there were other drivers in both directions on the tollway - someone else must have witnessed this. when i arrived at her house they were there and this is where we were able to get the pictures. they seemed to be higher up at this time and we were able to see the colors. i seem to be able to make out the triangle shape that the lights are on.    

this incident is the 3rd time i have seen something like this in this area - parmer lane to cedar park / leander. 

i wanted to share the pictures with you to get an opinion mostly. i am willing to give more details on this incident and the other two. 

thank you,

monica
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3rd time seeing this type of object with family member(s)

content.detailedDescription: Passanger in car...Gazed up at the sky..We new it was not of this planet..Football shape hovering with metal like color exs underneath along with something that appeared to look like a curtin beneath the football shape..I felt amazed at what we! seen was in news paper and there were multi sightings in the weeks to come lost sight when it took off in a sw direction frm the bridge i am now a 44yr old truck driver and have lived in nevada and traveled all over the usa and have had multi sightings in different states i am not!!!!!!! a fraud you have my email just email me and maybe we can talk in the future being that i cant give my number but i am willing to do so if ur serious as i am thank you !!!!! and keep ur eyes on the skys......
content.summary: Seen frm tapanzee br ny in 1978 est

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready for bed and took my dog out before i hit the sack.
i was looking at the beautiful cold night sky full moon with streak of clouds. then i sudden saw redflashing craft flying alittle above clouds. first i observed the craft as plane but it had no wings only a saucer shape with top and bottom hump. the object just flew closely above clouds in the bright full moon night. straight ne direction to nova scotia or canada. i thought i was crazy seeing an real saucer with shock feeling that its real after all. i could see windows clearly and flying in a normal speed until it passed into the hidden clouds. it was big like as an jet plane. there was no doubt it was an flying saucer. i decided to report my story later since watching some programs about the mufon. i thought this is a supernatural incident becz i never saw one so real and clear. thanks for hearing my story.
content.summary: It was a saucer shape with circle windows in red and white and red flasher under. looked grayish to silver surface.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately a year and half ago 30 of us had witnessed a strange event that took place above are church on a saturday. i would have to look into it the figure out a direct date. the event took place in san fernando valley california on calvin street next to tampa blvd. and sherman way. i know the time was approximately 230 to 3 o'clock because it was before church service. the objects appeared approximately at cloud height somewhat difficult to be sure from the lack of cloud cover. the objects were round with what appeared to be a small round sphere in the center. first i noticed one object then appeared several more, returning back to one object with no more than seven appearing at one time. i found your website while watching tv show on alien mysteries. i have to ask why the number seven? the objects were very difficult to see as if they were to blend in to the blue sky above. it took a great deal of focusing to be able to see the objects and of course the 30 of us talked about what they could possibly be the whole time.
content.summary: 30 people saw one turn into 2 then 3 with a total of 7 object apearing then turning back to 1 object hovering at cloud level.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to cool off and seen this oject flying from the north and going south right over market street in spokane that street about 800 to a 1000 feet from it was about over two blocks long and and maybe about 75 to 100 feet tall could not tell how wide it mad no sound then was looking at utube for this kind of story lord and behold i found what i saw told my wife that this is what i saw it was dark and it just went for about minut or so and just left to the south just went out of sight and then ran in to tell my wife this not the first time i seen some thing i didn't know what it  was when i was 14 i seen one that was hovering only about 4  to 3 foot off the ground me and my cousin witness this we were in montana coram motana never forget that to that was real small it was the shape of a diamond or like the old game where u push it down it was call top toy is the only way to say what the one look like .
content.summary: I got a pic i found on utube

content.detailedDescription:
I started seeing this object in feb 2013. the first time i saw it i was sitting outside and noticed a fireball nw of houston, which seemed to disintegrate. i thought it was a star or meteor. two nights later i saw the same thing. on march 24th i went outside and i noticed the same fireball type of object west. i noticed the object because it was exactly like the fireball i saw disintegrate. i often watch and photograph the night sky, and knew it was not a planet or plane as we live in flight path and the planes are obvious.It seemed to be hovering with some slight movement the the south.I went inside to get my camera and when i came back out it was further nw. i took several pictures with a 250mm lense. went back into to download the photos. then went out 10 minutes later and it was completely gone. i was expecting to see this orb as i have been seeing others recently.  

i am enclosing some photos along with a photo i took of the moon tonight. i'm fairly good at still photography at night..It appears the object was moving.
content.summary: Large golden orb seen on 4 nights a few weeks apart. the first two seemed to disentegrate, the recent one hovered thdn disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in our truck at 8:30 in the morning, facing due south, when 6 clouds appeared in the sky in a cluster. as we watched them move to the west, which seemed to move about 20 miles per hour, we observed them turn into 6 stars, 4 big and 2 small. as they moved toward the west, they went into a half arc formation. the 3rd star moved upward into the 2nd star and at the same time the 6th star moved upward into the 5th star. which made 2 stars on top and 2 stars on bottom. as they moved across the sky, they moved diagonal one way, then diagonal the other way, then they moved parallel across to the west, then suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: First appeared as 6 clouds, then looked like stars. 2 stars disappeared into the others, then all disappeared completely.

content.detailedDescription: i was in the back yard with my dog and i looked up and saw this white orb for a few seconds and then it disapeared. a few weeks later i was out back and i looked up again and there where two orbs traveling together to the south and when they got about 2 or 3 miles to the south they stopped and the one on the left went to the east for about a 1/4 of a mile and the other one waited until it came back and then they continued traveling south south west and dissapeard. the next time i saw them was about a month later. i was sitting at the computer and i heard a jet coming by really loud so i knew it was real low and i didn't think to much about it. so about 5 or 10 minutes later i heard the jet coming back so i got up and walked outside to see what was going on. by that time the jet was about a mile to the south and to the right of the jet was a single orb they continued on to the south. that is my story and i have seen them since. i still look up every time i go outside at night hopping they will return,but no luck yet.Thank you
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a orb

content.detailedDescription: I was 18 years old. sleeping with my adult girlfriend, she awoke first and woke me immediately. she was terrified and tried to get away by climbing  over me toward the corner of walls. hovered and moved about the room as if it had some sort of mission. communicated with me telepathicly and told me it was not there to harm us. hovered 2' from my hand and i wanted to swipe my hand through it ,as it told telepathicly not to, or i would be severely shocked. hovered to the middle of the room and then leave through the wall.  approximately 2 -3 minutes later there was a knock at the front door and a very large indian man form the reservation  asked if we were ok and that a ufo was hovering over the house. i don't remember talking to him at length about it but my girlfriend did. i felt somewhat downloaded immediately after and felt that it now knew me somehow. i also have had 3 other experiences later with missing time and amnesia immediately after to the effect of not even knowing my name afterward. this happened to me 30 years ago. i saw a u tube video of the wilshire crop formations where the 3 orbs hovered over the field and as they leave the crop formation appeared. that was approximately 3 years ago. my family knows my story from long ago and saw what i had described  to them on the video years ago. i can tell more of my story about the other events. i am a brother, father, and husband and am not crazy about what happened long ago. i would like to talk to someone who might have more info about my experiences.
content.summary: Telepathic communication hovering in my bedroom. i saw the same thing on a u tube video 3 years ago  wilshire england crop circle formation 3 orbs. more later for a 6 ;month period 3 other occasions

content.detailedDescription:
1.)riding my motorcycle in the green ridge state forest.
2.)i stopped at a popular overlook to rest and enjoy the sight.(point lookout). a hawk screeched from above, which made me look up, and that is when i noticed the object. 
3.) i knew immediately that i was witnessing something special and extraordinary. nothing like i had ever seen.
4.)a cigar shaped object. very shiny and metallic. revolving slowly (i think) moving straight line to the nw. very high in the sky (i think), and possibly very large.
5.)only visible for about 5 seconds. i got real excited. wished that i had seen it earlier on the horizon. felt privileged to see it.
6.)went beyond the tree line, out of sight.

i know that this is a late report with approximate dates. 
when i got home i saw on the news that several people had witnessed ufo activity in the hagerstown (md) area shortly before my sighting.
if you want the exact date, i could probably get it for you by contacting whag news.
it was a beautiful autumn day without a cloud in the sky. 
you can see a lot of sky from point lookout.
the object was coming out of wv over the potomac river into md w of little orleans in a nw direction.
i am just glad that a hawk called above me or i never would have seen the craft. probably never see anything like that again, but i will keep my head to sky!
content.summary: Cigar shaped, shiny metallic (like an airstream) revolving, large (i think), and high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9 p.M. i walked to the shell gas station to buy newport smokes. when i walked down toward the corner, my attention drew to the sky to the left because there was a brighter light than the other stars. i kept observing for about a minute, but then i decided to walk home and bring my video camera back to where i saw it, since my house was only a block away. what i saw was a heavy white light, it pulsated bigger and then drew back as it pulsated, but the pulsating was most clear at the edges of the circle, and the white color only remained white at the edges. it flickered more rapidly than the stars, and it changed colors in a repetitive fashion. the inner color changed from white to red to blue, and the depth of the color looked very unique. a policeman stopped his car and had asked me what i was doing because from his view it looked like i was recording somebody's house, but rather i was recording the sky above the house. i really can't remember any clouds. i told him that i tried to look at the surrounding stars, maybe try and see if the pulsating is happening elsewhere, or maybe it was my eyes, but both possibilities weren't valid. all the other stars looked like solid white stars. when i told him that, he walked toward me and then stood beside me to look at it. he said, "yeah i can see it. is your camera getting it?" i said, "no, the zooming in is making it blurry." he didn't talk much after that and eventually he drove away. what i saw was very unique and unusual. i already posted a question about what i saw on yahoo! answers. also, i never knew that mufon was a legitimate organization until today when i read that a newspaper editor had told a citizen to go to mufon. i haven't forgot what i saw. it's just affecting me but i don't why. i'm a 23 year old male. fyi: i dropped my camera in the hackensack riverbank, but i can still make a sketch.
content.summary: It made me stop walking. i was on my way home.
